desc: UpBloomin is a unique IPL Laser Hair Removal Handset and it is the World’s #1 selling IPL Handset! UpBloomin is designed to deliver long-lasting visible results in just 3 weeks, full-body treatments are done in 30 minutes, just once per week.

layout.text: Cheaper than laser, more convenient than shaving, and WAY less painful than waxing…
